entry.title: Brain Storm in BKU with Prof. François Taddei and other students
entry.content:
Changing your belief and behavior and  then we change and improve our system.

If the system didn't change, I will not change my teaching.

As to our life and our living enviroment, are we active or passitive?

The government is our son. We raise him to grow up to help not just to give orders. We will love and guide our son, and also punish him for doing wrong. If he is planning to murder and have not regrets, we will stop him and replace it with a better son.
